resources.string: Access to the camera is needed for detection
This application cannot run because it does not have the camera permission. The application will now exit.
Ocr dependencies cannot be downloaded due to low device storage
"Ftwfy can help you to fast find any occurrence of a word using your camera."
"Go straight to the point when you need to locate titles, names, dates, e-mails, phone numbers etc in big text files."
"You can also make use of regular expressions to help you find text by its patterns in a more advanced way."
